content.text: Match ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 2.
Second Half ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 2.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Christoph Kramer (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Offside, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Julian Korb tries a through ball, but Fabian Johnson is caught offside.
Offside, Barcelona. Neymar tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Neymar (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Christoph Kramer (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Neymar (Barcelona).
Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Rafinha (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Oscar Wendt.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. André Hahn replaces Lars Stindl.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Patrick Herrmann replaces Thorgan Hazard.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Yann Sommer.
Attempt saved. Arda Turan (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Foul by Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 2. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner following a corner.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Neymar.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Nico Elvedi.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ibrahima Traoré.
Attempt missed. Lars Stindl (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ibrahima Traoré.
Corner,  Borussia Mönchengladbach. Conceded by Jordi Alba.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona).
Offside, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 1. Arda Turan (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Neymar with a through ball.
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Fabian Johnson (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Barcelona. Arda Turan replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt saved. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafinha replaces Paco Alcácer.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Foul by Sergi Roberto (Barcelona).
Lars Stindl (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lars Stindl (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Fabian Johnson replaces Raffael because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sergi Roberto with a cross.
Second Half begins Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 0.
First Half ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 0.
Attempt blocked. Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lars Stindl.
Attempt missed. Lars Stindl (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Raffael.
Attempt missed. Jordi Alba (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Julian Korb.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic.
Foul by Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 1, Barcelona 0. Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mahmoud Dahoud following a fast break.
Foul by Neymar (Barcelona).

Attempt missed. Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Raffael following a corner.
